LanguageData.OdysseyTips.WorldSearch: Use the magnifying glass button in the bottom-right of the world map screen to search for landmarks or quest locations.
LanguageData.OdysseyTips.Vacsuits: In addition to vacsuits, marine and recon armor can also keep people alive in space.
LanguageData.OdysseyTips.FishPopulation: Fish in larger bodies of water. Larger ponds yield more fish per catch.
LanguageData.OdysseyTips.UncommonFish: The larger a body of water is, the higher the chance that it will have uncommon fish.
LanguageData.OdysseyTips.GasInVacuum: Gasses like smoke or rot stink will dissipate faster in the vacuum of space.
LanguageData.OdysseyTips.InsectSludge: Insect sludge terrain slows most creatures - but not insects.
